text: Ariel Besse (born 7 October 1965) is a French actress. Her first film role was a starring part in Bertrand Blier's 1981 film Beau Pere, when she was 15.Lloyd Paseman, "'Beau Pere' romantic comedy with man-child sexual theme," The Register-Guard, 4 March 1982, p. 8D. Besse's parents sued the distributors for the poster, which shows her breasts, as it was exhibited on billboards around France without their permission, losing the case. She is also noted for playing Aline in the film Mora (1982). After three films, she quit acting and became a mail carrier for La Poste, and had three children.
